textBox.richText: It’s been dry since the break...not a lot of snow to speak of. Then, this week, WP got 6” on Monday night, 5” Tuesday night, and another 3” Wednesday night. I went up solo Thursday night for a day of skiing Friday, searching for leftovers. Started over at Eagle. Not too bad...the Thunderbird trees were much better than Medicine Man & Black Coal. You could squeeze over to Left Hand...pretty good in there too; but I needed a water break. Headed down the switchyard trees (REALLY good in there), and decided to do a Pano lap on the off chance they’d opened Belle...and they did! Great tracks in there...vid and graphs below.
